summary.span: 定义并表示动态程序集。

span.span: Defines and represents a dynamic assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态程序集是使用反射发出 Api 创建程序集。A dynamic assembly is an assembly that is created using the Reflection Emit APIs. 保存动态程序集使用时保存动态程序集中模块方法。The dynamic modules in the assembly are saved when the dynamic assembly is saved using the method. 若要生成可执行文件，必须调用方法来标识是对程序集的入口点的方法。To generate an executable, the method must be called to identify the method that is the entry point to the assembly. 程序集保存为 Dll 默认情况下，除非方法请求生成一个控制台应用程序或基于 Windows 的应用程序。Assemblies are saved as DLLs by default, unless the method requests the generation of a console application or a Windows-based application. 如果动态程序集包含多个动态模块，程序集的清单文件名称应与指定为第一个参数的模块的名称匹配方法。If a dynamic assembly contains more than one dynamic module, the assembly's manifest file name should match the module's name that is specified as the first argument to the method. 某些方法对基础类，如`GetModules`和`GetLoadedModules`，将无法正常工作时从调用对象。Some methods on the base class, such as `GetModules` and `GetLoadedModules`, will not work correctly when called from objects. 你可以加载定义动态程序集，并在加载的程序集上调用方法。You can load the defined dynamic assembly and call the methods on the loaded assembly. 例如，若要确保资源模块包含返回的模块列表中，调用`GetModules`上加载对象。For example, to ensure that resource modules are included in the returned module list, call `GetModules` on the loaded object. 使用的动态程序集的签名后才会有效程序集保存到磁盘。The signing of a dynamic assembly using is not effective until the assembly is saved to disk. 因此，强名称不会使用瞬态动态程序集。So, strong names will not work with transient dynamic assemblies. 若要获取对象，请使用方法。To get an object, use the method. ## 反射发出动态程序集方案Reflection emit dynamic assembly scenarios 以下是使用时要考虑的一些事项类来创建动态程序集。The following are some things to consider when using the class to create dynamic assemblies. ### 动态模块Dynamic modules 反射发出支持创建动态程序集中定义的动态模块。Reflection emit supports the creation of dynamic modules defined in dynamic assemblies. 在动态程序集创建的动态模块可以是暂时性或持久。A dynamic module created in a dynamic assembly can be transient or persistable. ### 类型引用的限制Restrictions on type references 程序集可以引用另一个程序集中定义的类型。Assemblies can reference types defined in another assembly. 瞬态动态程序集可以安全地引用另一个瞬态动态程序集、 持久的动态程序集或静态程序集中定义的类型。A transient dynamic assembly can safely reference types defined in another transient dynamic assembly, a persistable dynamic assembly, or a static assembly. 但是，公共语言运行时不允许引用暂时动态模块中定义的类型的持久动态模块。However, the common language runtime does not allow a persistable dynamic module to reference a type defined in a transient dynamic module. 这是因为当被持久动态模块加载时保存到磁盘，运行时无法解析对暂时动态模块中定义的类型的引用。This is because when the persisted dynamic module is loaded after being saved to disk, the runtime cannot resolve the references to types defined in the transient dynamic module. ### 发出到远程应用程序域的限制Restrictions on emitting to remote application domains 某些情况下需要创建和执行远程应用程序域中的动态程序集。Some scenarios require a dynamic assembly to be created and executed in a remote application domain. 反射发出不允许直接到远程应用程序域发出的动态程序集。Reflection emit does not allow a dynamic assembly to be emitted directly to a remote application domain. 解决方案是发出在当前的应用程序域的动态程序集，将发出的动态程序集保存到磁盘，然后将动态程序集加载到远程应用程序域。The solution is to emit the dynamic assembly in the current application domain, save the emitted dynamic assembly to disk, and then load the dynamic assembly into the remote application domain. ### 动态程序集访问模式Dynamic assembly access modes 可以使用以下访问模式之一创建动态程序集：Dynamic assemblies can be created using one of the following access modes: - 动态程序集由对象是暂时性。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is transient. 动态程序集仅可用于执行发出的代码。The dynamic assembly can only be used to execute the emitted code. - 动态程序集由对象是持久的但之前已从磁盘加载已保存的可移植可执行 (PE) 文件，无法执行。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable but cannot be executed until the saved portable executable (PE) file has been loaded from disk. - 动态程序集由对象是持久的但还可以在执行之前和之后保存程序集/，才会或到磁盘。The dynamic assembly represented by an object is persistable, but can also be executed before and/or after the assembly is saved to disk. 必须通过提供相应指定访问模式值对的调用中方法时的动态程序集定义，不能在以后对其进行更改。The access mode must be specified by providing the appropriate value in the call to the method when the dynamic assembly is defined and cannot be changed later. 运行时使用的动态程序集的访问模式优化程序集的内部表示形式。The runtime uses the access mode of a dynamic assembly to optimize the assembly's internal representation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义具有一个模块的动态程序集。The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module. 该示例程序集中的模块包含一个类型， `MyDynamicType`，它具有私有字段、 一个属性，获取和设置私有字段、 初始化该私有字段的构造函数和乘以私有字段的用户提供的数字的方法值并返回结果。The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result. 指定当创建程序集。 is specified when the assembly is created. 立即，使用程序集代码和程序集也将保存到磁盘，以便它可以检查与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或在另一个程序中使用。The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cpp/24895.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cs/24895.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/vb/24895.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `fileName` 不应为相同的任何其他持久模块、 独立托管资源或独立的清单文件。`fileName` should not be the same as that of any other persistable module, standalone managed resource, or the standalone manifest file. 假定公共文件中的托管的资源。The managed resources in the file are assumed to be public. 指定的资源文件必须将保存程序集的目录中。The specified resource file must be in the directory where the assembly will be saved. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将资源文件附加到一个动态创建的程序集，使用`AddResourceFile`。The following code sample demonstrates how to attach a resource file to a dynamically created assembly, using `AddResourceFile`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 它是错误的程序集中定义具有相同名称的多个动态模块。It is an error to define multiple dynamic modules with the same name in an assembly. 定义的动态模块是暂时性的。The defined dynamic module is transient. 未保存的动态模块，即使父动态程序集创建与。The dynamic module is not saved, even if the parent dynamic assembly was created with . > [!NOTE] > 若要调试动态模块时取消优化，应用属性设为动态程序集之前调用。To suppress optimizations when debugging dynamic modules, apply the attribute to the dynamic assembly before calling . 创建的实例与标志，并将其使用应用方法。Create an instance of with the flag and apply it using the method. 该属性必须应用于动态程序集。The attribute must be applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果应用于该模块，无效。It has no effect if applied to the module. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个暂时动态模块使用`DefineDynamicModule`。The code example below demonstrates how to create a transient dynamic module using `DefineDynamicModule`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集可以与只将一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，调用或后一种方法调用以前会引发 System.ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要与 Microsoft ResMerge 实用工具 （未提供与公共语言运行时） 之类的工具合并多个非托管的资源。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft ResMerge utility (not supplied with the common language runtime). > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过调用`DefineUnmanagedResource`，传递的外部资源文件。The example below demonstrates a call to `DefineUnmanagedResource`, passing an external resource file. span.span: Defines an unmanaged version information resource using the information specified in the assembly's AssemblyName object and the assembly's custom attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集可以与只将一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，调用或后一种方法调用以前会引发 System.ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要与 Microsoft ResMerge 实用程序 （不提供与公共语言运行时 SDK） 等工具合并多个非托管的资源。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft ResMerge utility (not supplied with the common language runtime SDK). 空自变量字符串获取编写为一个空格。Empty argument strings get written as a single space. 空格将替换为自变量字符串中的 null 字符的。Spaces are substituted for null characters in the argument strings. 从推断信息`AssemblyName`对象用于定义此动态程序集。The information is inferred from the `AssemblyName` object used to define this dynamic assembly. 此程序集的自定义属性重写中指定的信息`AssemblyName`对象。This assembly's custom attributes override information specified in the `AssemblyName` object. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了的用法`DefineVersionInfoResource`。The example below illustrates the usage of `DefineVersionInfoResource`. summary.span: 对此具有给定规范的程序集，定义一个非托管的版本信息资源。

span.span: Defines an unmanaged version information resource for this assembly with the given specifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序集可以与只将一个非托管资源关联。An assembly can be associated with only one unmanaged resource. 这意味着，调用或后一种方法调用以前会引发 System.ArgumentException。This means that calling or after either one of the methods was called previously will throw the System.ArgumentException. 需要与 Microsoft 之类的工具合并多个非托管的资源`ResMerge`实用程序 （不提供与公共语言运行时 SDK）。Multiple unmanaged resources need to be merged with a tool such as the Microsoft `ResMerge` utility (not supplied with the common language runtime SDK). 空自变量字符串获取编写为一个空格。Empty argument strings get written as a single space. 空格将替换为自变量字符串中的 null 字符的。Spaces are substituted for null characters in the argument strings. 版本资源的结构包括版本、 语言和文件分发的标识的数据。The structure of the version resource includes data that identifies the version, language, and distribution of the file. 安装程序文件安装库 （ver.中使用函数DLL) 以从文件中检索版本信息资源并将从资源中提取的版本信息块。Installation programs use the functions in the file installation library (VER.DLL) to retrieve the version information resource from a file and to extract the version information blocks from the resource. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了的用法`DefineVersionInfoResource`。The example below illustrates the usage of `DefineVersionInfoResource`. summary.span: 将此动态程序集保存到磁盘。

span.span: Saves this dynamic assembly to disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将保存此动态程序集中定义的所有非瞬态动态模块。This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly. 不保存瞬态动态模块。Transient dynamic modules are not saved. 程序集文件名称可以是一个模块的名称相同。The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the modules. 如果是这样，程序集清单将存储在该模块。If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module. `assemblyFileName` 可以从所有包含程序集内的模块的名称不同。`assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly. 如果是这样，该程序集文件将包含仅程序集清单。If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest. 每个获取使用，此方法将写入的.resources 文件和调用若要关闭的流。For each obtained using , this method writes the .resources file and calls to close the stream. `assemblyFileName`必须是一个简单的文件名，不带驱动器或目录部分。The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component. 若要在特定的目录中创建一个程序集，使用之一采用目标目录自变量的方法。To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the methods that takes a target directory argument. 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，此重载方法等效于调用方法重载为`portableExecutableKind`参数和为`imageFileMachine`参数。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this overload of the method is equivalent to calling the method overload with for the `portableExecutableKind` parameter and for the `imageFileMachine` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建动态程序集，然后将其保存到本地磁盘使用`Save`。The following code sample creates a dynamic assembly and then persists it to a local disk using `Save`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将此动态程序集保存到磁盘，并指定此程序集的可执行文件中代码的性质以及目标平台。

span.span: Saves this dynamic assembly to disk, specifying the nature of code in the assembly's executables and the target platform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`imageFileMachine`和`portableExecutableKind`不兼容，`imageFileMachine`优先于`portableExecutableKind`。If `imageFileMachine` and `portableExecutableKind` are incompatible, `imageFileMachine` takes precedence over `portableExecutableKind`. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 例如，如果你指定与，将被忽略。For example, if you specify with , is ignored. 此方法将保存此动态程序集中定义的所有非瞬态动态模块。This method saves all non-transient dynamic modules defined in this dynamic assembly. 不保存瞬态动态模块。Transient dynamic modules are not saved. 程序集文件名称可以是一个模块的名称相同。The assembly file name can be the same as the name of one of the module. 如果是这样，程序集清单将存储在该模块。If so, the assembly manifest is stored within that module. `assemblyFileName` 可以从所有包含程序集内的模块的名称不同。`assemblyFileName` can be different from the names of all of the modules contained within the assembly. 如果是这样，该程序集文件将包含仅程序集清单。If so, the assembly file contains only the assembly manifest. 每个获取使用，此方法将写入的.resources 文件和调用若要关闭的流。For each obtained using , this method writes the .resources file and calls to close the stream. `assemblyFileName`必须是一个简单的文件名，不带驱动器或目录部分。The `assemblyFileName` needs to be a simple file name without a drive or directory component. 若要在特定的目录中创建一个程序集，使用之一采用目标目录自变量的方法。To create an assembly in a specific directory, use one of the methods that takes a target directory argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何设置格式，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档，有关详细信息中的元数据规范`binaryAttribute`。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. `RuntimeConstructorInfo` 是由系统生成的一种特殊类型。`RuntimeConstructorInfo` is a special type generated by the system. 它派生自类，并且任何通过反射获取的对象是实际的实例`RuntimeConstructorInfo`。It derives from the class, and any object you obtain through reflection is actually an instance of `RuntimeConstructorInfo`. > [!NOTE] > 不能用于设置声明性安全属性。 cannot be used to set declarative security attributes. 使用的重载之一采用必需的可选的并被拒绝的权限。Use one of the overloads of that takes required, optional, and refused permissions. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此成员不再需要与标志。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。)若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`SetCustomAttribute`若要将自定义特性附加到动态生成的程序集。The following code sample illustrates the use of `SetCustomAttribute` to attach a custom attribute to a dynamically generated assembly.
